channel.title: Comments on: Jodi
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jenny
item.dc:creator: Jenny
item.description: I think this is the year I was in Britten's Chemistry class, which means it would be the year you were in britten's Chemistry class. They should have reconsidered letting you play with fire and volatile chemicals. Same could be said for me, too, I suppose.
item.content:encoded: I think this is the year I was in Britten’s Chemistry class, which means it would be the year you were in britten’s Chemistry class. They should have reconsidered letting you play with fire and volatile chemicals. Same could be said for me, too, I suppose.
